snippet: The government has deployed tens of thousands of police and paramilitary soldiers to guard polling booths in insurgency-racked areas. But the rebels have only stepped up their attacks.
lead_paragraph: The government has deployed tens of thousands of police and paramilitary soldiers to guard polling booths in insurgency-racked areas. But the rebels have only stepped up their attacks.

headline.main: 14 Die in India as Maoists Step Up Raids
headline.print_headline: 14 Die in India As Maoists Step Up Raids
